title: Move element from end of list to beginning

content.description:
A code segment is intended to transform the list utensils so that the last element of the list is moved to the beginning of the list.

For example, if utensils initially contains  ["fork", "spoon", "tongs", "spatula", "whisk"], it should contain ["whisk", "fork", "spoon", "tongs", "spatula"] after executing the code segment.
content.question: Which of the following code segments transforms the list as intended?

choices.label:
len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH(utensils)
temp <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> utensils[len]
REMOVE(utensils, len)
APPEND(utensils, temp)

len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH(utensils)
REMOVE(utensils, len)
temp <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> utensils[len]
APPEND(utensils, temp)

len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH(utensils)
temp <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> utensils[len]
REMOVE(utensils, len)
INSERT(utensils, 1, temp)

len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH(utensils)
REMOVE(utensils, len)
temp <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> utensils[len]
INSERT(utensils, 1, temp)

content.answer:
len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH(utensils)
temp <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> utensils[len]
REMOVE(utensils, len)
INSERT(utensils, 1, temp)

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
